name: Planet Anihilator
description:
Made by only me.

All assets are from me except the explosion and the background.

Softwares used : 

Unity : https://unity.com/
Paint.net : https://www.getpaint.net/
Piskel : https://www.piskelapp.com/
BoscaCeiol : https://boscaceoil.net/

Assets used : 

Explosion : https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/2d-flat-explosion-66932
Background found in : https://www.wallpaperup.com/
Sound of the explosion : http://soundbible.com/free-sound-effects-1.html

Dreamlo prefab : https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/network/dreamlo-com-free-instant-leaderboards-and-promocode-system-3862
